column5: Frank is holding his spring sale tomorrow at Bridgenorth Sport and Marine, great deals to be had for all, ice is gone panfish are waiting, also the Kawartha Lakes Chapter of Muskies Canada will be there hosting a Charity BBQ to raise funds for our Pike Invasion Project as well, so come out, get stocked up on some great tackle deals, and have lunch at the same time.
Cool, I might be in the area. Thanks for the heads up!  S.
